name: DEMI BRA WITH LACE PRINT
description: More heavenly than ever, with printed lace on the cups for an invisible look under clothing, softer Memory Fit padding that conforms to your curves and stretchier lace sides for an ultra-comfy fit. With a smoothing U-shaped back and supersoft cup lining and straps.

name: SOFTENING BODY BUTTER
description: The fruity fragrance you can't get enough of, with rich shea and jojoba butters, plus antioxidant vitamin E for long-lasting, intensive moisture.

name: ULTRA-MOISTURIZING HAND AND BODY CREAM
description: Ignite passion and intensity with the new VS Fantasies Passion Struck Ultra-moisturizing Hand and Body Cream. An addictive, alluring scent in a 24-hour moisturizing formula. The deeply nourishing formula is fortified with replenishing avocado and sweet almond oils plus hydrating honey, and it caresses skin with a sultry blend of Fuji apple and vanilla orchid.

name: VERY SEXY FRAGRANCE MIST
description: Perfect for when you want a light touch of scent, Very Sexy Fragrance Mist is the sheerer version of the sultry, fragrance you know and love, now in a sleek, new bottle. This provocative fragrance teases skin with a seductive blend of vanilla orchid, sun-drenched clementine and midnight blackberry.

name: THE MOST-LOVED YOGA LEGGING
description: A must-get legging with the same sleek, curve-loving fit and foldover waistband as our Most-Loved Yoga Pant. Premium stretch cotton moves comfortably with you, out, in or at the gym as the foldover waistband hugs your shape.

name: LACE-TRIM CHEEKY PANTY
description: A sweet way to show a little cheek. Trimmed in supersoft lace, this sexy little panty comes in a rainbow of colors and prints–why not flirt in them all?
